actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide certain counties with the ability to receive television broadcast signals of their choice.
short_title: Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006

summary.text: Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006 - Amends federal copyright law and the Communications Act of 1934 to allow certain counties and areas to receive broadcast transmissions of network televsion stations located in the capital of the state in which such counties and areas are located.

titles.title: Satellite and Cable Access Act of 2006
A bill to provide certain counties with the ability to receive television broadcast signals of their choice.
